'''1.17.30.52''' is a minor update to {{edition|education}}, released only for Windows on November 4, 2021, which fixes a critical bug.<ref>https://edusupport.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360047556451-Minecraft-Education-Change-Log</ref>

== Fixes ==
* Fixes an issue that caused a "Sign-in required" error on specific proxy environments.
